Destiny 2 Enchant artes

# Artes passive enchants

Effect Name Effect Name TL Ky Lo Ju Re Na Ha Summary
攻撃力アップ ATK up ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ Increases damage by 4/8/12/16%, including extentions and mystics
命中率アップ Accuracy UP ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ Increases Accuracy by 5/10/15/20
詠唱速度上昇 Casting Speed ◯ Temporarily increases casting speed by 10/18/26/34% for 780/840/900/960 Frames
SP減少軽減 SP cost Reduction ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ Decreases SP cost per frame during arte usage by 0.012/0.024/0.036/0.048
クリティカル Crit UP ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ Arte critical value increases by 6.25/11.25/18.75/25%
耐性- Shave RES ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ 65% chance to temporarily decreases Foe's Elemental resistence by 6/9/12/15%. The reduced resistence is the character's strongest
知性- Shave INT ◯ ◯ ◯ ◯ 55% chance to Temporarily Reduces foe's INT by 6/10/14/18%
詠唱速度- Shave Cast Speed ◯ 55% change to temporarily reduce foe's cast speed by 10/18/26/34%
属性攻撃貫通 Ph. RES penetration ◯ ◯ Only your highest resistense applies when hiting with an elemental arte, by a number of hits equals to the enchant level
属性晶術貫通 M. Res penetration ◯ ◯ Only your highest resistense applies when hitting with an elemental spell, by a number of hits equals to the enchant level
瞬間完全回避 Ivunerabily ◯ ◯ ◯ Gives 4/6/8/10 I-Frames during arte usage
ブラスター Blast ◯ ◯ ◯ Increase spirits blast count by 2/4/6/8
アイテム強奪 Rob Item ◯ ◯ Increses the arte item steal rate by 62.5/75/87.5/100%

# Artes Active enchants

Effect Name Effect Name TL Ky Lo Ju Re Na Ha Summary
ふっ飛ばし Throw away ◯ ◯ Pressing circle while hitting the enemy throws it back right after. 42/40/38/36 SP cost
背面取り Rear dash ◯ ◯ Pressing circle during the arte, within a certain distance, dashes behind the enemy. 20/18/16/14 SP cost
ガードブレイク Guard Break ◯ ◯ Pressing circle while hitting a guarding enemy reduces enemy guard value by 8. 24/21/18/15 SP cost
空中発動 Aerial ◯ Can execute the arte even in air, including extentions, 10/9/8/7 SP cost
ガード発動 Guard Counter ◯ ◯ ◯ Able to execute the arte right after guarding an attack. 20/18/16/14 SP cost
反撃発動 Counter ◯ Able to execute the arte right after suffering damage. 50/47/44/41 SP cost
攻撃後前進 Front Step ◯ ◯ If pressing circle during the arte, does a front step right after. 10/9/8/7 SP cost
攻撃後後退 Back step ◯ ◯ ◯ Pressing circle during the arte does a back step right after. 10/9/8/7 SP cost
通常技連携 Normals chain ◯ ◯ Becomes able to follow the arte with normal attacks by pressing circle during the arte. 33/29/25/21 SP cost
特技連携 Super chain ◯ ◯ Able to chain the arte with a different arte, only once. 33/27/24/21 SP cost
晶術追撃 Magic follow-up ◯ ◯ Very fast cast speed for a lower grade spell if used right after the spell. 80/76/72/68 SP cost
追加特技 Arte extention ◯ ◯ ◯ Pressing circle while hitting an enemy with the arte executes an extention arte. 18/16/14/12 SP cost. 5 TP cost
秘奥義 Mystic Arte ◯ ◯ ◯ Pressing circle while *staggering* an enemy with the arte executes a mystic arte. 100/99/98/97 SP cost. 20 TP cost
